message.body: next time you go to Lawrence stop in St Louis on your way back to Phili for crimany sake! just a megabus ride away!

Hmmm... Doesn't look like it. Write me sometime. Sam and I broke up a few days ago. I'm in Philly still, packing up my stuff and figuring out some new plans. We're both a bit of a mess. I'd really like to hear from some old friends. So would Sam, I'm sure. Take care Eric, talk to you soon.
